original_text: And the sons of the singers gathered together from the district surrounding Jerusalem and from the villages of the Netophathites;
korean_text: 이에 노래하는 자들이 예루살렘 사방 들과 느도바 사람의 마을에서 모여들고

sentences.original_text: And the sons of the singers gathered together
and from the villages of the Netophathites
